attributes.review: This app was so boring and annoying. But really staring at paint dry is better and faster than tho app 🤷🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: I was so happy to have this app 😩 I wanted to support my racist, homophobic, sexist, transphobic president 🥰 but as soon as I opened the app my phone started glitching and was logging me out every time I opened the app 😤😤 and was asking me for my phone number , address and all my personal info 😢 this app is trying to stalk me 😭😭😭 plz don’t get this app it’s horrible 🤮🤮🤮🤮 all I just wanted to do is support my “wonderful “ president 🥺🥺

this app is the worst app i’ve ever used. it glitched my phone so bad i couldn’t use it for two days and i finally went to a phone store and they couldn’t do anything so i had to buy a whole new phone. then i decided to try again and i kept receiving text messages and emails from a number talking about this app and when i tried to block and cancel the “subscription” it wouldn’t work. when i blocked the number it used a different number. so i had to get a new phone. this app is so terrible take this off the app store so no one else has to go through this again.!
attributes.title: i would give it a 0 star but ig i cant✨🧚🏻‍♂️💕

attributes.review: Everything about this app screams propaganda from its tacky layout to its constant notifications. The home screen is disgusting and not user friendly at all. It looks like Trump tried to make his own version of Facebook but for racists and supremacists. Each article reads like it’s been written by a “paid” intern who is clearly over their job. Mary Trump was right about Donald.
attributes.title: completely propaganda

attributes.review: Once upon a time there was a lovely princess. But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort, which could only be broken by Love's first kiss. She was locked away in a castle guarded by a terrible fire breathing dragon. Many brave knights had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison, but none prevailed. She waited in the dragon's keep in the highest room of the tallest tower for her true love and true love's first kiss. Like that's ever going to happen. What a loony.
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: I heard that this app was a very fun game. Upon downloading, which took several hours and crashed my phone twice, it told me that i had to make an account. Very strange for a game, but I did. Then it told me i had a chance of receiving a picture of some orange man, which is almost as bad as those games where you lose real money. anyways, will not be downloading again
attributes.title: bad bad very bad 😡

attributes.review: This app crashes consistently which is really unfortunate because I was looking forward to reading about the Chinese hoax climate change! This app should be either removed from the App Store or completely recoded because it makes my phone overheat and the app always crashes even though I have the newest phone.
attributes.title: Such a laggy app full of fake news

attributes.review:
